channel.title: [474]Assistance in making a webclient
channel.description:
Hello.
I have a client (not of the usual sort, it seems) which I would like to turn into a webclient...
The client already has a cache downloader and it is fantastic in and of itself... However.
I cannot seem to get it to run through a browser... I would highly appreciate some help regarding this. [img]http://i.imgur.com/1XgBScP.png[/img] Thank you very much.
P.S. I created the HTML file through jarmaker, I've also tried a custom html file provided by various guides... I feel the issue is in the client itself.
